description:
This course is about learning a beautiful language that many country have as first language. It will help you to be able to travel and to appreciate your trip in french countries. In this course you will learn basic words like : animals, colour, shapes, countries, meals, fruits, vegetables,... You will also learn basic sentences and verbs.

To make you learn easier it will be video lectures and at the end of each section you will have a quizz to practice. You should take this course if you want to learn a new language and if you want to travel. I am a good teacher and I love my native language and I am proud to help you learn french.
title: Learn french to travel and see the world!
